features: 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧-Espresso machine adopts a one-touch management mode and meets the needs of easy use for all ages. Turn on the machine, make coffee, make milk froth only need to dial the operation knob once. Automatic temperature control eliminates manual operation.

𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐨𝐦 𝐂𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠 - The original coffee making system ensures the controllability of the coffee liquid. Pair with our graduated Carafes (1-4 cups, 4 cups is 240 ml) to create a thick, silky espresso.

𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐤 𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭 - Silky, dense milk froth can be easily made with convenient operation (please use whole milk) and become your own Cappuccino and Latte Expert. Milk froth tube is equipped with a short anti-burn tube, safety first.
𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 - Aesthetically pleasing, small and lightweight design without reducing functionality. Durable and low noise, suitable for all families.
𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐝𝐞𝐬 - 1 steam espresso machine, 1 Filter and Funnel, 1 Spoon, 1 Carafe, 1 Manual, 1 Ping for cleaning milk froth tube.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOWTECH ESPRESSO MACHINE-BE YOUR OWN BARISTA Designed for permanent use, it impresses with its highly sophisticated features: it is easy to operate, maintain. The SOWTECH coffee machine allows everyone to realize the wish of "making coffee by hand".

Previous page Fast heating up Fast brewing technology, 800W heating performance, you can enjoy coffee faster. Efficient Extraction Extract at a constant temperature to retain the original flavor of coffee. Powerful steam wand The 360-degree adjustable powerful steam wand froths milk more fully and faster. Easy to use Turn on the machine, make coffee, make milk froth only need to dial the operation knob once. Next page 1 Fast Heating Up 2 Efficient Extraction 3 Powerful Steam Wand 4 Easy To Use

Golden taste The water temperature of 185 degrees Fahrenheit can not only ensure the efficiency, but also retain the original taste of coffee. Multifunctional steam wand It can heat milk or froth thick milk to satisfy your taste buds every time, making coffee so fun. One-key management Turn left to make coffee, turn right to froth milk, simple operation, suitable for everyone. Modern design SOWTECH espresso machine harmoniously blends into the modern design language with its unique simplicity and symmetry.

About coffee powder Please use the coarse and medium powder(>0.5mm). Espresso(fine) powder is not suitable. About the amount of water Every time you add water, please add 4 cups of water. It is the best choice to make coffee or milk. About metal filter Add powder as needed. Do not exceed the maximum amount of powder added. About center lock Please place the funnel in the correct position. Please don't make coffee without a locked funnel.
How to use the espresso machine? Step 1 Add water and coffee powder. Step 2 Twist to correct position. Step 3 Make coffee Step 4 Froth the milk. Step 5 Make coffee products.
WHAT DO WE GET FOR THE BOX ?

What is the small red plastic thing with a wire used for? It is used to clean steam pipes. How about after-sales service? If you have any questions in the future, we will do our best to solve it for you. Why is there no steam to froth the milk? 1，Please pay attention to keep the water tank with enough water to make steam to froth the milk. 2，Please clean the steam wand according to the instructions to avoid clogging the wand due to curdled milk. What if I receive a used product? The Amazon team specializes in handling product returns and exchanges, which can cause some used products to be redistributed to new customers, resulting in a bad shopping experience. Please contact the Amazon team immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Excellence in Blending, Usage, and Cleanup , I very like it !
reviews.reviewText: The SOWTECH Espresso Coffee Machine has not only redefined my morning coffee routine but has also set the bar high with its remarkable blending power, user-friendly design, and hassle-free cleaning process. The blending power of this espresso machine is truly exceptional. The 3.5 Bar pressure ensures a consistently rich and full-bodied extraction, delivering a cup of espresso that rivals the quality of high-end coffee shops. The machine's ability to effortlessly create a creamy and velvety froth with the steam milk frother adds a layer of sophistication to every sip. It's a testament to the thoughtful engineering that brings barista-level quality to the comfort of my kitchen. Ease of use is another standout feature of the SOWTECH Espresso Coffee Machine. From setup to brewing, the intuitive controls make the entire process a breeze. Even for those new to espresso machines, the straightforward interface allows for quick and hassle-free operation. The convenience of being able to brew 1-4 cups ensures that whether I'm hosting guests or enjoying a quiet moment alone, the machine adapts to my coffee needs effortlessly. The sleek design of the machine extends beyond aesthetics to practicality. Its compact form factor takes up minimal space on my countertop, making it a stylish addition to any kitchen. The user-friendly design is evident in every aspect, from the easily accessible water tank to the clear and concise controls. The black finish not only looks modern but is also resistant to stains, maintaining its elegance with minimal maintenance. Perhaps one of the most appreciated aspects of this espresso machine is its easy cleaning process. The removable parts and simple disassembly make cleanup a quick and stress-free task. The drip tray, water reservoir, and portafilter are easily accessible and dishwasher-safe, saving valuable time in the busy mornings. In terms of value, the SOWTECH Espresso Coffee Machine offers an unbeatable combination of performance, user-friendliness, and ease of maintenance. The durability of the materials used instills confidence in its long-term reliability, making it a wise investment for coffee enthusiasts. In conclusion, the SOWTECH Espresso Coffee Machine stands out as a paragon of excellence in blending power, ease of use, and cleaning convenience. Elevate your coffee experience with this impressive appliance that seamlessly combines style with substance, making every cup a delightful and hassle-free indulgence. Say goodbye to complicated brewing processes and hello to the perfect cup of espresso at your fingertips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact without sacrificing flavor, and SO much better than a Nespresso
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: for the price of this machine, it makes a fantastic espresso and is absolutely worth it!I was really getting weary of spending $8 at a coffee shop for a tiny drink every time I was craving flat white and was looking for an at home solution. I already had a Nespresso machine at home that I almost never used anymore because I really disliked the taste and the quality of the drinks it could make. However, I was really skeptical about being able to make a decent espresso at home using a machine that wasn't wildly expensive and didn't take up a ton of space, but I decided just to give this a shot.I am so happy I did! This machine allows me to make what I think is a really delicious espresso base (way better than I was expecting!) using my preference of fresh coffee grounds. It is incredibly compact compared to others on the market and it allows me just to get a flavorful shot of espresso without all the bells and whistles or the super high price tag. I can't comment on this being the BEST espresso ever and it might not make the cut for the really serious coffee aficionados, but for me it is a perfect solution. and the taste is 1000x better than anything the Nespresso ever made.HIGHLY recommend if you are thinking about getting a starter espresso machine (or ditching your Nespresso) but don't want to commit to something expensive and complicated. This is simple and effective and I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a very profitable tool for my coffee cafe business, I really like the product!!!♥️
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a SOWTECH Espresso Coffee Machine and I tried it straight away and it really improved my coffee drinking experience at home. With 3.5 bar pressure, it consistently produces rich and flavorful espresso, cappuccinos and lattes. The 1-4 cup capacity is perfect for pampering yourself and entertaining guests, The integrated steam milk frother is a standout feature, creating soft microfoam for lattes and adding the perfect touch to cappuccinos. The sleek black design adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen, and the compact size doesn't compromise functionality. What sets this machine apart is its user-friendly design. It's easy to operate, and the fast heating ensures I get my coffee without having to wait long. The build quality is impressive, making it a long-lasting addition to my kitchen, For coffee lovers looking for a reliable, affordable espresso machine that serves barista-quality drinks, the SOWTECH Espresso Coffee Machine is a must-have. It strikes the perfect balance between performance, comfort and style I highly recommend this item , I love it!!!♥️
